UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification and Characterization of Antimicrobial Peptides From Butterflies: An Integrated Bioinformatics and Experimental Study.
Literature.Author: Wang M, Zhou Z, Li S, Zhu W, Hu X

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=64 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:<10% Cytotoxicity=64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MBC=2µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=8µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MBC=16µM)
